summary: When a self-centered doctor is diagnosed with cancer, he becomes better able to empathize with his patients and appreciate a life outside his career.

Freeman|William Marquez|Kyle Secor|Nicole Orth-Pallavicini|Ping Wu|Tony Fields|Brian Markinson|Maria Tirabassi|Ken Lerner|Bruce Jarchow|E. title: El doctor
